text: North Rothbury is a small town located in the Hunter Region of New South Wales, Australia. It is 19 km from Cessnock. In the 2016 Australian Census the suburb was home to 898 people. The town is home to a small population of the critically endangered North Rothbury Persoonia (Persoonia pauciflora). ==References== Category:Towns in New South Wales Category:Suburbs of Singleton Council Category:Suburbs of City of Cessnock
title: North Rothbury, New South Wales
